QuestionStem: A hydrologist needs to know how much water will run off into a river in the spring after an exceptionally snowy winter. What data will the hydrologist need to consider? Choose all that apply.

options.AnswerText: B. amount of precipitation in the winter
C. depth of snowpack on surrounding mountain peaks

CorrectFeedback: A hydrologist would need to consider all of these data to come to a conclusion.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Think about which processes in the water cycle might affect snow as winter changes to spring.
IncorrectFeedback: Think about which processes in the water cycle might affect snow as winter changes to spring.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: A hydrologist would need to consider all of these data to come to a conclusion.
